reviews.review: I was banned about 4 years ago i was wondering if it was possible to get my account unbanned since the game is free now a
this could be good game if the cheater and alt account problems were to be fixed.

Arkadaşlarla kafa dağıtalım diye girip hileler yüzünden kanser olup çıkacağınız bir oyun...
One of the best, who need to know more about!

I wouldn't recommend buying this game if you recently just got your Steam Account because it is very difficult to play against/amongst cheaters & toxic players ruining the match completely.

I would recommend buying this game on ONE condition and that is that you have atleast ONE friend you can play with, If you can fill up a whole team, do that you do not want to have randomly selected teammates as this almost never ends well.

I feel like the Trust Factor System is unfair because it groups you with real cheaters because other people think you're cheating just because you're in the wrong skill group. It's pretty obvious from most of my matches that I belong in a higher skill group than Gold Nova Master/Master Guardian 1, It's just the rank that was handed to me after 10 wins in both Wingman and Competitive.
Quando jogo faz raiva, quando não jogo faz saudade!

Наиграв в эту игру порядка 900 часов, могу с увереностью заявить что долбление в очело не самое ужасное что было в моей жизни. Я бы даже сказал,что я бы согласился нюхать мужские пенисы чем пытаться поднять здесь звание. 7  дней бана из 10
